story.iWant: the basic web application framework running
story.soThat: UI components can be built and user interactions implemented
story.tasks: - [ ] Implement basic application routing - [ ] Initialize state management - [ ] Set up responsive layout framework - [ ] Configure development server

story-context.acceptanceCriteria:
**Given** project setup is complete **When** developer starts the application **Then** web application loads on localhost:3000 **And** basic routing is configured for main sections **And** state management is initialized **And** responsive layout framework is in place
**Prerequisites:** Story 1.1

artifact.title: Architecture
artifact.snippet: Use Next.js with App Router, Zustand for state management, and Tailwind CSS for responsive design.

artifact.title: Epics
artifact.snippet: Foundation epic establishes core web application framework and user interface infrastructure.

story-context.constraints: - Use Next.js App Router for modern routing - Implement Zustand for lightweight state management - Follow architecture.md specifications for component organization - Ensure responsive design from the start

tests.standards: Use Jest and React Testing Library for component testing. Include routing and state management tests.
tests.locations: __tests__/components/ for component tests, __tests__/stores/ for state tests.
tests.ideas: - Test application startup and routing - Verify state management initialization - Test responsive layout components - Validate development server configuration
